1539300.name: RPG Maker MV - JRPG and Fantasy Music Vol 2
1539300.description:
The new JRPG and Fantasy Music Vol. 2 DLC pack by Sonancy Designs sets out to remind creators of all the great adventures they have experienced in past RPGs with a sound that is still uniquely theirs. This music pack presents an inspiring soundtrack for all the key moments creators are looking for when developing their own grand adventure in RPG Maker.

The JRPG and Fantasy Music Vol. 2 pack contains 20 music tracks that are infused and inspired by classic RPGs, providing creators a classical tone with both low and up-tempo melodies that are perfect for scenes of heroic discovery, grand battles, an introduction of a powerful kingdom, a scene of conflict, and so much more! If you are looking for a soundtrack with emotion and the ability to remind your players of past great JRPGs, then look no further!

Features:

* 20 BGM tracks suitable for JRPG, fantasy and adventure games!
* ogg, mp3, and m4a formats included
* For use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
1539300.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 日语, 韩语, 繁体中文, 阿拉伯语, 简体中文
